name: Magic Unicorn pop match 3
description:
Are you ready for the best match 3 puzzle? Do you love unicorns? Well everyone does! Let's make it through the challenging world of magic unicorn match-3 puzzle with special and entertaining features. Get this puzzle free on your device!

The free travel fun of the entire world awaits for you! Get 3 stars in every puzzle of magic unicorn match 3 to score maximum points. Beat the top scores of elite players of this great puzzle game. Rule the leaderboard by completing every challenge ahead of everyone. Swipe finger to match at least 3 same unicorns in a line to burst them and clear the levels.

Features:
+ Hundreds of challenging puzzles
+ Simple gameplay, stunning graphics
+ Easy to play but hard to master
+ Solving every match 3 puzzle in this endless adventure travel
+ Recommended for kids and children too
+ Mind teasing puzzles to train your brain

Experience the adventure travel with a flying horse in all kind of challenging unicorn games in this match 3 puzzle game. Enjoy! Have unlimited match 3 fun with magic unicorns!
